data_table.description: The Phase 2 Exam was conducted between 2000 and 2004. This dataset includes parental death status and parental and sibling history of hypertension, diabetes, CHD, carotid surgery, and stroke.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: De-identified Subject Identifier

variable.name: DADALIVE
variable.description: Is your biological father alive?

variable.name: DYROD
variable.description: What was his year of death or age at death? - year

variable.name: DAGEATD
variable.description: What was his year of death or age at death? - age

variable.name: DYROB
variable.description: What was his year of birth (if deceased or living) or what is his current age (if living)? - year

variable.name: DADAGE
variable.description: What was his year of birth (if deceased or living) or what is his current age (if living)? - age

variable.name: DADHYT
variable.description: Does/did your biological father have high blood pressure or hypertension diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: DHYTMED
variable.description: Was medication ever prescribed by a physician to lower his blood pressure?

variable.name: DHYTAGE
variable.description: How old was he when medication was first prescribed to lower his high blood pressure?

variable.name: DHRTPROB1
variable.description: Did your biological father ever have a heart attack or myocardial infarction diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: DHRTAGE1
variable.description: How old was he when the heart attack or myocardial infarction first occurred?

variable.name: DHRTPROB2
variable.description: Did your biological father ever undergo coronary bypass surgery/angioplasty/balloon dilation/or a stent put in because arteries of the heart were blocked?

variable.name: DHRTAGE2
variable.description: How old was he when the procedure was first performed?

variable.name: DSTROKE
variable.description: Did your biological father ever have a stroke/cerebral hemorrhage/or brain attack diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: DSTRKAGE
variable.description: How old was he when the event first occurred?

variable.name: DCAROTID
variable.description: Did your biological father ever have surgery on a carotid artery in the neck because the artery was blocked?

variable.name: DCAROTIDAGE
variable.description: How old was he when he first had this procedure?

variable.name: DAD_HBS
variable.description: Did your biological father ever have diabetes or high blood sugar diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: MOMALIVE
variable.description: Is your biological mother alive?

variable.name: MYROD
variable.description: What was her year of death or age at death? - year

variable.name: MAGEATD
variable.description: What was her year of death or age at death? - age

variable.name: MYROB
variable.description: What was her year of birth (if deceased or living) or what is her current age (if living)? - year

variable.name: MOMAGE
variable.description: What was her year of birth (if deceased or living) or what is her current age (if living)? - age

variable.name: MOMHYT
variable.description: Does/did your biological mother have high blood pressure or hypertension diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: MHYTMED
variable.description: Was medication ever prescribed by a physician to lower her blood pressure?

variable.name: MHYTAGE
variable.description: How old was she when medication was first prescribed to lower her high blood pressure?

variable.name: MHRTPROB1
variable.description: Did your biological mother ever have a heart attack or myocardial infarction diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: MHRTAGE1
variable.description: How old was she when the heart attack or myocardial infarction first occurred?

variable.name: MHRTPROB2
variable.description: Did your biological mother ever undergo coronary bypass surgery/angioplasty/balloon dilation/or a stent put in because arteries of the heart were blocked?

variable.name: MHRTAGE2
variable.description: How old was she when the procedure was first performed?

variable.name: MSTROKE
variable.description: Did your biological mother ever have a stroke/cerebral hemorrhage/or brain attack diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: MSTRKAGE
variable.description: How old was she when the event first occurred?

variable.name: MCAROTID
variable.description: Did your biological mother ever have surgery on a carotid artery in the neck because the artery was blocked?

variable.name: MCAROTIDAGE
variable.description: How old was she when she first had this procedure?

variable.name: MOM_HBS
variable.description: Did your biological mother ever have diabetes or high blood sugar diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: FULLSIBS
variable.description: How many full biological siblings do you have?

variable.name: SIBWHYT
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters have/had hypertension diagnosed by a physician for which medication was prescribed?

variable.name: HSIBSU60
variable.description: How many of these brothers and sisters were <60 when the hypertension was first diagnosed and treatment prescribed?

variable.name: SIBSWMI1
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters ever had a heart attack or myocardial infarction diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: MISIBU601
variable.description: How many of these brothers and sisters were <60 when the event first occurred?

variable.name: SIBSWMI2
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters ever underwent coronary bypass surgery/angioplasty/balloon dilation/or a stent put in because arteries of the heart were blocked?

variable.name: MISIBU602
variable.description: How many of these brothers and sisters were <60 when the procedure was done?

variable.name: SIBSSTRK
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters ever had a stroke/cerebral hemorrhage/or brain attack diagnosed by a physician?

variable.name: SSIBSU60
variable.description: How many of these brothers and sisters were <60 when the event first occurred?

variable.name: SIBWCAROTID
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters ever had surgery on a carotid artery in the neck because the artery was blocked?

variable.name: CSIBSU60
variable.description: How many of these brothers and sisters were <60 when the procedure was done?

variable.name: SIBSWHBS
variable.description: How many brothers and sisters ever had diabetes or high blood sugar diagnosed by a physician?
